title: Extend SS-Pings: Change Sound-Pitch in Relation to Map Location
body:
1. If you ping SS in top, the sound-pitch of it is slightly higher.
If you ping SS in bot, the sound-pitch is slightly lower.
Mid stays as the same.
The function would be a gradient from the upper left corner to lower right, which results in a smooth transition. This way your ping alone is an auditory cue for the last known position.

2. This might further be extended by another gradient function for your own half vs. the enemy half (add vibrato gradually in your own half, especially useful when you're getting counter-jungled and the jungler didnt see but heard it due to teammate ping).
